channel.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317] Help!
channel.description:
Ok so I am following this guide: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434617.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434617.0.html[/url] , and i have a pi 317 source. I am stuck on the part of the guide where is says:Server Side
This is the part that most people get wrong. Add your COM driver which you downloaded into your server files and then make a new Java file called MYSQL.java (With capitals).

item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317] Help!
item.dc:creator: @corbinzscape corbinzscape
item.description:
@corbinzscape wrote:

i already had a folder named com and it looked like the same 1 to me , idk what to do now ._. where do i put mysql.java

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317] Help!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Yes, you must put the file in the deps folder, if you can’t find a deps folder look for dep, or lib, or libs.

Read full topic

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Take the file they said for you to download and add it into either your dep or lib folder, the folder should be alone side others like Data, src, bin, ect, ect.

item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317] Help!
item.dc:creator: @corbinzscape corbinzscape
item.description:
@corbinzscape wrote:

It says : Add your COM driver which you downloaded into your server files and then make a new Java file called MYSQL.java
So what does “Add your COM driver which you downloaded into your server files” mean? , I have teamviewer ;3

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317] Help!

item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317] Help!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You create a class called MYSQL.java and then add what they said to into it, then you need to download the file and put it into your deps or libs folder (this folder is used to hold all you’re external libraries). you may need to add the library to your compiler and run scripts.

I suggest you move onto an IDE, it will greatly help you with you’re programing.

Read full topic
